title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the injustices of the American South seen through the eyes of a young girl.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling depiction of a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story of love, ambition, and betrayal in the Roaring Twenties.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic tale that also critiques societal expectations and class divisions.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: An exploration of the history and impact of Homo sapiens on the world.
